715390.name: The Express Killer - Soundtrack
715390.description:
The Express Killer - Soundtrack includes 18 tracks in Mp3 format, just for you (yes, you!).

Tracklist:
01 - Introduction (0:48)
02 - Main Menu (0:44)
03 - Train Station (2:55)
04 - Train Second Class (2:57)
05 - Train First Class (2:02)
06 - Train Bar (2:06)
07 - Retro Bar (1:36)
08 - Retro Room (1:00)
09 - Retro Town (1:27)
10 - Interviews, round 1 (0:46)
11 - Interviews, round 2 (0:41)
12 - Interviews, round 3 (0:43)
13 - MiniGame Moustaches (1:48)
14 - MiniGame Bongos (1:48)
15 - MiniGame Cassetes (1:48)
16 - MiniGame Teeth (1:48)
17 - MiniGame Suitcase (1:48)
18 - Justin Case (2:17)

Songs will be downloaded to the The Express Killer - Soundtrack folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\...\The Express Killer - Soundtrack
715390.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
